```{r start}
library(devtools)
load_all("../phlabr")
library(sf)
```

# Read Data

```{r readdata}
data = read.table(opts$c)
data$Date = as.Date(data$Date)
lcw = last_complete_week(data$Date)
lcwdata = data[lcw,]
summary(lcwdata)
head(lcwdata)
```

# Range of Data

```{r range}
range(lcwdata$Date)
```
